pages.title: Parasytic Louse
pages.text: Similar to $(item)Silverfish$(), this parasyte will move towards and try to bite whoever is near. Its bite does almost no damage, and are so fragile that a small hit can kill them. They can be picked up by interacting with them, and placed back down by placing them on a block.$(br)The Louse can be obtained with a $(l:mutations/parasytic_louse)Mutation$(/l).

pages.title: Potion Hunger
pages.text: The Parasytic Louse can be fed any drinkable $(item)Potion$() by crafting them together. When the Parasytic Louse will bite another creature, it will apply the potion effect to them.

pages.title: Reactive Defence
pages.text: A Potion-fed Louse that is in a player's hotbar will defend its owner. When the player is hit, the Louse will bite the player if it has been fed with a beneficial Potion, or the attacker otherwise. If more Parasytic Louses are present in the hotbar, only one will bite per hit.
